title: Bettye LaVette: Meet the Author
itunes:author: iBooks
itunes:subtitle: R&B music legend Bettye LaVette talks about her life, her long and storied career in music, and her memoir, A Woman Like Me. LaVette is honest and unflinching with moderator Harry Weinger, touching on the music industry, the creative process, and what it was like to turn her life's stories into a book.
itunes:summary: R&B music legend Bettye LaVette talks about her life, her long and storied career in music, and her memoir, A Woman Like Me. LaVette is honest and unflinching with moderator Harry Weinger, touching on the music industry, the creative process, and what it was like to turn her life's stories into a book.
itunes:keywords: Bettye LaVette, Harry Weinger, A Woman Like Me, david ritz, memoir, autobiography, author, interview, R&B, soul, motown, betty lavett, betty lavette, apple store
